ygData.subject: Re: ROBES
ygData.msgSnippet: can a high elf wizard wear black sr apprentice robes from neriak?  I d have to convince one of my dark cousins to buy it for me if that was the case. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
can a high elf wizard wear black sr apprentice robes from neriak? I'd have
to convince one of my dark cousins to buy it for me if that was the case.

-----Original Message-----
From: Rob Kay [mailto:applezoom@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:22 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ROBES


From: "Rob Kay" <applezoom@...>

Only place i've evr seen black robes are in nariak, i think
necromancer guild.

>Gnome city in Steamfont??? YELLOW ROBE (Sr. version?)
>
>I was specifically looking for a RED ROBE or BLACK ROBE . . .
>
>Thanks!!!
>
>-Mata 9th lvl High Elf Wizard (Eci)
